resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.description: Add a tag to a subscriber
options.action: Add a tag to a subscriber

options.name: Get Many
options.description: List subscriptions to a tag including subscriber data

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a tag from a subscriber
options.action: Delete a tag from a subscriber

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

id.name: id
id.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
id.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

label.name: label
label.description: The label of the custom field
label.ai_hint: The label of the custom field

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.description: Receive only active subscribers or cancelled subscribers
additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

name.name: name
name.description: Tag name, multiple can be added separated by comma
name.ai_hint: Tag name, multiple can be added separated by comma

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tagId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'customField' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customField' AND operation IN ["update", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'customField' AND operation IN ["update", "create"] THEN SHOW parameter 'label'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'customField' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'customField' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'form' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation IN ["addSubscriber", "getSubscriptions"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'addSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'addSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "getSubscriptions"] AND resource == 'form' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "getSubscriptions"] AND resource == 'form' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getSubscriptions' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'sequence' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'sequence' AND operation IN ["addSubscriber", "getSubscriptions"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'sequence' AND operation == 'addSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "getSubscriptions"] AND resource == 'sequence' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation IN ["getAll", "getSubscriptions"] AND resource == 'sequence' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'sequence' AND operation == 'addSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'sequence' AND operation == 'getSubscriptions' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tag' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tagSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tagSubscriber' AND operation IN ["add", "getAll", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'tagSubscriber' AND operation IN ["add", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'tagSubscriber' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tagSubscriber' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tagSubscriber' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tagSubscriber' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
